rules_text:
Reborn 2–{5}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
As long as Seraph’s Outcast is reborn, it has flying and lifelink and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
